about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Together, we don't just capture your wedding—we create a timeless story you'll treasure forever.
about.description:
We're Mario & Gabriela, a couple and creative team with over 5 years of experience—and here's why you'll get the best wedding video with us:

As a couple ourselves, we understand how important it is to feel comfortable in front of the camera. Our promise is to make you feel as relaxed as you would with close friends. The result? A wedding film that looks like a movie—filled with real emotions and authentic moments.

Our goal is to give you the most unforgettable memory, one that makes you feel the same emotions you lived on that day, every time you watch it.

Based in Playa del Carmen and always ready to travel worldwide, we combine our strengths:
about.mario: a videographer and photographer with a sharp eye for creative, one-of-a-kind shots.
about.gabriela: the heart behind the storytelling, bringing sensitivity and emotion to every frame.

projects.title: Elena & Roberto
projects.subtitle: A golden sunset, barefoot on the sand
projects.description: Their love story began with a chance encounter on a rainy afternoon in Mexico City. Years later, they chose to celebrate surrounded by the Caribbean breeze and the warmth of their closest friends and family.

projects.title: Clara & Maximilian
projects.subtitle: Where the mountains meet the soul
projects.description: An intimate ceremony in the heart of the Dolomites, where every glance spoke louder than words. The mist rolling through the valleys became part of their story.

projects.title: Anna & Sebastian
projects.subtitle: Dancing under a thousand lights
projects.description: A celebration that felt like a dream—vintage champagne, candlelit gardens, and a first dance that made time stand still. Their joy was contagious, their love undeniable.

projects.title: Hannah & Simon
projects.subtitle: A love letter written in the wind
projects.description: They wanted nothing but the ocean, the sky, and each other. A ceremony on the cliffs of Big Sur, where the Pacific witnessed their promises to forever.

projects.title: Lucía & Andrés
projects.subtitle: Roots, rhythm, and endless laughter
projects.description: A hacienda filled with marigolds, mariachis, and three generations dancing until dawn. Their wedding was a tribute to heritage, family, and the deepest kind of love.
